oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hādhihi al-musammāh bi-Yāqūtat al-ʻilm / lil-Shaykh Abī Isḥāq al-Tūnisī : manuscript, [1629]
Muqaddimah musammāh bi-Yāqūtat al-ʻilm
Yāqūtat al-ʻilm
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tūnisī, Abū Isḥāq.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Biqāʻī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Ḥamīd al-Dīn. (copyist.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 27 lines per page, in black and red.

The third work in the collection dated 19 Jumadá al-Awwal 1038 AH [January 13, 1629 AD] (f. 10v) and copied in the hand of Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Ḥamīd al-Dīn al-Biqāʻī. This work (Yāqūtat al-ʻilm) appears to be copied around the same time in the same hand.
Bound with: Kitāb Sharḥ al-basmalah / li-Shaykh al-Islām Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī (ff. 1r-4v) -- Qiṣṣat Maryam al-ṣāmitah (ff. 9v-10v).
MS Arab 109. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islamic law--Interpretation and construction
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ياقوتة العلم
هذه المسماة بياقوتة العلم / للشيخ أبي إسحاق التونسي : مخطوطة، [1629]
مقدمة مسماه بياقوتة العلم
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: بقاعي، أحمد بن محمد بن أحمد بن حميد الدين. (copyist.)
